title: Bug in auth guild ranks endpoint

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body:
Sorry for the long response time — was on holiday!

Been looking into this for about an hour, and I think the issue is that the permissions for that “Member” rank are deprecated permissions which aren’t currently serialized out properly. If that’s the case, then it should be fixed with the next release — or as a workaround, if you have the guild leader toggle off the existing permissions, save, then toggle them back on and re-save it should start emitting the correct list.

Working on verifying that the fix I’m tinkering with correctly serializes out that rank.

Sorry about that :x

comments.author: AfterXII.2761
comments.body:
Hey guys, I’m not getting permissions coming through for our “Member” id rank:

https://api.guildwars2.com/v2/guild/BAF85407-0DD8-4968-B278-B5BDB0FDD438/ranks?access_token=DF7AFCC3-2299-314F-92AB-A5FB13C3682596E06E80-E28C-4C4E-BBE1-6789B930D3B0

Any idea why?
